question: The ring toss game at the carnival made the same amount of money each day. In total in 30 days they earned 420 dollars. Together with game they earned 22 dollars. How much did ring toss game make per day?
response:
The ring toss game made $420 in total in 30 days.
The game made $22 in addition to the total.
The total money earned from the game is $420 + $22 = $442.
The ring toss game made $442 in total in 30 days.
The ring toss game made $442 / 30 days = $<<442/30=14.7>>14.7 dollars per day.
The answer is $14.7.
